title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Assume nothing is as obvious as it appears today. Build a bridge of greater understanding by actively seeking out a different perspective on a difficult position. Be open about your concerns, especially if you feel exposed and uncomfortable now. Your emotional accessibility encourages a reserved individual to be more approachable. Nothing validates another person like being seen and heard. Your courage and compassion are priceless gifts to someone who could use both now. Revealing your heart changes everything. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
